nodes.text: An old friend of the Alderaanian girl Anandra Milon's family lived on Level 3108 of the planet Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Following the destruction of the planet Alderaan in 0 BBY, Anandra and her brother, Santigo Milon, fled from their home on Level 3204 to the family friend in order to avoid arrest by Imperials. The friend, who was supposed to help the pair escape arrest, offered apologies and excuses but could not help, instead promising that a smuggler on Level 2142 could transport the pair offworld.
The family friend was mentioned in "One Thousand Levels Down", a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 151 on July 22, 2014.
